name: Voice Clone (TTS + RVC)
description: Generates speech with F5-TTS and applies RVC voice conversion for high-fidelity voice cloning. Two-stage pipeline: TTS generates base speech, then RVC converts to target voice. Requires TTS-Audio-Suite with RVC support.

models.rvc: User-provided RVC .pth model files (100-300MB each, place in models/TTS/RVC/)

parameter_notes.text: Text to speak. Supports unlimited length with smart chunking.
parameter_notes.model: TTS model variant for base speech generation.
parameter_notes.voice_reference: Reference voice for F5-TTS zero-shot cloning. Name of .wav + .txt pair in voices directory.
parameter_notes.rvc_model: RVC model filename (.pth) for voice conversion. Must be pre-trained on target voice.
parameter_notes.pitch_shift: Pitch adjustment in semitones. 0 = no change, +12 = one octave up, -12 = one octave down. Use for gender/age adjustment.
